actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 in order to insure the balancing of environmental considerations with economic and social considerations in complying with the provisions of such Act.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969, that all agencies of the Federal Government shall consider economic and social considerations in complying with the provisions of such Act. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 4332)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 in order to insure the balancing of environmental considerations with economic and social considerations in complying with the provisions of such Act.
